¶ And unto this people <S%H5971><s%> thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you the way <S%H1870><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, and the way <S%H1870><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.
